SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Level.LevelManager

Class ActorSpawnerManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Level.LevelManager.ActorSpawnerManager
public class ActorSpawnerManager extends Object
Manages the spawning of various actors (such as enemies, projectiles, ammo boxes, and hearts) in the game. It also updates the state of active actors and ensures the user's plane hitbox is correctly added to the scene. The class interacts with the ActiveActorManager to manage and update actors, spawn projectiles, and spawn collectible items.

  • Field Summary

    Field
    Description
    private final ActiveActorManager
    activeActorManager
    The ActiveActorManager that manages all active actors (enemies, projectiles, items, etc.) in the game.
    private final Random
    random
    The Random instance used to generate random numbers for random spawning and positioning of objects.
    private final javafx.scene.Group
    root
    The root Group node where all actors are added to the scene.
    private final UserPlane
    user
    The UserPlane representing the player's plane in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActorSpawnerManager

      public ActorSpawnerManager(ActiveActorManager activeActorManager, UserPlane user, javafx.scene.Group root)
      Constructs an instance of ActorSpawnerManager. Initializes the manager with the provided ActiveActorManager, UserPlane, and the root Group for the scene.
      Parameters:
      activeActorManager - the ActiveActorManager that manages all active actors in the game
      user - the UserPlane representing the player's plane
      root - the root Group where all actors are added to the scene

  • Method Details

    • updateActors

      public void updateActors()
      Updates the state of all actors in the game. This method generates enemy fire, spawns random items (ammo boxes and hearts), and ensures that the user's plane hitbox is present in the scene.

    • addUserPlaneHitbox

      private void addUserPlaneHitbox()
      Ensures the user's plane hitbox is added to the scene, if it is not already present. This method checks if the hitbox is null and if it is not added to the root, then it adds the hitbox to the root.

    • generateEnemyFire

      public void generateEnemyFire()
      Generates enemy fire by iterating through all enemy units (such as fighter planes) and spawning projectiles for them. This method adds each generated projectile to the scene.

    • spawnEnemyProjectile

      private void spawnEnemyProjectile(ActiveActorDestructible projectile)
      Spawns an enemy projectile and adds it to the scene. This method also adds the projectile to the list of enemy projectiles managed by ActiveActorManager.
      Parameters:
      projectile - the enemy projectile to spawn

    • spawnRandomItems

      public void spawnRandomItems()
      Spawns random items (ammo boxes and hearts) in the game. The items are spawned based on their respective spawn probabilities.

    • spawnRandomAmmoBox

      private void spawnRandomAmmoBox()
      Spawns a random ammo box based on its spawn probability. If an ammo box is spawned, it is added to the scene and the list of ammo boxes managed by ActiveActorManager.

    • spawnRandomHeart

      private void spawnRandomHeart()
      Spawns a random heart based on its spawn probability. If a heart is spawned, it is added to the scene and the list of hearts managed by ActiveActorManager.

    • addActorToScene

      private void addActorToScene(ActiveActorDestructible actor, List<ActiveActorDestructible> actorList)
      Adds an actor to both the scene and the corresponding actor list in ActiveActorManager. This method ensures that the actor is added to the scene and to the appropriate list (e.g., ammo boxes, hearts).
      Parameters:
      actor - the actor to add to the scene
      actorList - the list of actors to add the actor to

    • addAmmoBox

      private void addAmmoBox(AmmoBox ammoBox)
      Adds an ammo box to the scene and the ActiveActorManager's list of ammo boxes.
      Parameters:
      ammoBox - the ammo box to add

    • addHeart

      private void addHeart(Heart heart)
      Adds a heart to the scene and the ActiveActorManager's list of hearts.
      Parameters:
      heart - the heart to add

    • addEnemyUnit

      public void addEnemyUnit(ActiveActorDestructible enemy)
      Adds an enemy unit to the scene and the ActiveActorManager's list of enemy units.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy unit to add
